divs: Sighting Detailswe were riding down a dark road to talk to a freind, saw a light moving slow, I kinda knew what it was because its not the first time I myself encontered, so I asked my friend what was that flying in the sky, I said it looks like a hellicopter flying in the sky, they said yea thats what it looks like so we talk a little not taking my eyes off the light I knew what it was I just wanted witness so no one would think im crazy, so we left going back down the dark road the light was still there floating in the sky changing colors red,white,blue,yellow, clear in our face we stop down the road and I asked my freind, what the hell is that, we looked for several mins. then I was shocked because it was moving in a fashion that no hellicopter could move like, I say I knew what it was because it was not the first time I encontered a UFO, its about my forth time, the first time it was really scary it was kinda closer, I mean very close, that was the most frightening shit I ever seen in my life.
